entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
